title: Efficient photocatalytic degradation of ofloxacin by a polyimide/phosphate-doped porous coralline carbon nitride S-scheme heterojunction
content:

Yufeng Zeng, Yishun Wang, Xicheng Wang, Kun Chen, Ping Chen, Zhenjun Xiao, Qianxin Zhang, Wenying Lv, Guoguang Liu
The establishment of a heterojunction holds significant promise for facilitating the separation and migration of photogenerated carriers, thereby engendering robust photooxidationâ€“reduction capabilities.
